cards.name: Acin, the Toymaker Avatar
cards.originalText:
Your starting life is 24.
{X}, Discard a card: Create a token that's a copy of a creature card with converted mana cost X chosen at random. If X is 11 or greater, choose a creature with converted mana cost X or greater instead. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery and only once each turn.
cards.text:
Your starting life is 24.
{X}, Discard a card: Create a token that's a copy of a creature card with converted mana cost X chosen at random. If X is 11 or greater, choose a creature with converted mana cost X or greater instead. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery and only once each turn.

cards.text: (Right-click to choose a random creature with converted mana cost 4, 5, 6, or {7}.)

cards.name: Massive Surprises
cards.originalText: (Right-click to choose a random creature with converted mana cost 8, {9}, {10}, or 11+. 11+ will pull any creature with converted mana cost 11 or greater.)
cards.text: (Right-click to choose a random creature with converted mana cost 8, {9}, {10}, or 11+. 11+ will pull any creature with converted mana cost 11 or greater.)
